created_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the ticket comment was created.

timestamp.description: UNIX timestamp representing the time the ticket comment was created.

body.description: Text body of the ticket comment.

id.description: Unique identifier for the ticket comment.

ticket_id.description: Identifier of the ticket to which the comment belongs.

event_type.description: Type of event associated with the ticket comment.

via_reference_id.description: Reference ID associated with the channel through which the ticket comment was created.

html_body.description: HTML formatted body of the ticket comment.

plain_body.description: Plain text version of the ticket comment body.

public.description: Flag indicating if the ticket comment is public or private.

audit_id.description: Unique identifier for the audit associated with this ticket comment.

author_id.description: Identifier of the author of the ticket comment.

via.description: Channel through which the ticket comment was created.

metadata.description: Additional metadata associated with the ticket comment.

attachments.description: Information about any attachments included in the ticket comment.

uploads.description: Information about any file uploads associated with the ticket comment.
